parameters.name: IsWarning
parameters.description: True if the error is a warning, false if not NOTE : This parameter should only be examined if the return value is non-zero.

title: IFeature.GetErrorCode2
description: Gets the error code for this feature.

parameters.name: IsWarning
parameters.description: True if the error is a warning, false if not NOTE : This parameter should only be examined if the return value is non-zero.

returns: Feature error code as defined in swFeatureError_e
remarks:
This method returns many of the errors indicated by the What's Wrong icon seen with an invalid feature in the FeatureManager design tree.
During feature creation, you can prevent the error dialog from appearing by using
IModelDoc2::ShowFeatureErrorDialog
.
